backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles with authorization, phone checks, profile pictures, and conversation/message data structures.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for reference.
Detailed checklist for promoting a preview frontend build to production and validating deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, radius, and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, icons, manifest, and mounting root for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, colors, categories, and display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first for shell assets and network-first for dynamic requests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication flow, onboarding intro, splash screen, section navigation, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Navigation header component handling authentication state, section switching, and user menu rendering.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the Vibechat logo with fallback text if the image fails to load and supports multiple size options.
frontend/src/components/CameraCaptureDia: Dialog for capturing photos using the device camera with error handling, preview, and capture controls.
frontend/src/components/chat/ai/AIHelper: Bottom sheet UI that shows on-device smart reply suggestions and inserts selected text into the chat.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: Displays a conversation view with header, messages, composer, and an AI helper sheet. Fetches participants and messages and tracks the latest received message.
Shows the user's conversations with participant previews and loading/error states. Allows selecting a conversation and displays placeholders when no conversations exist.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Provides a message input box with attachments, smart replies, rewrite options, and optional WhatsApp sharing. Handles sending messages, file validation, and external text insertion.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageTime: Renders the message list with timestamps, attachments, and like/unlike interactions. Fetches messages and like data and formats bubbles based on sender.
frontend/src/components/chat/NewConversa: Modal dialog for starting a new chat by entering a Principal ID. Validates input, handles creation mutations, and resets state when closed.
frontend/src/components/ContactsSyncDial: Dialog for syncing contacts via picker or manual input and matching them to existing Vibechat users.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Empty file placeholder for a profile dialog component.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoPick: Allows selecting or capturing a profile photo with validation, preview, and camera dialog integration.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallCallou: Callout prompting users to install the PWA, with install state handling and dismiss functionality.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Splash screen component showing the logo with fade‑out animation before app initialization completes.
frontend/src/components/videos/mockSpons: Defines the SponsoredVideoItem type and a list of mock sponsored video metadata.
frontend/src/components/videos/Sponsored: Grid feed of sponsored video items that opens a viewer when clicked.
Dialog-based viewer for a sponsored video showing thumbnail, metadata, and simulated playback progress.
frontend/src/components/videos/useSimula: React hook that simulates playback progress over time with reset and completion handling.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppStyleAut: Implements a multi-step WhatsApp-like authentication flow handling phone entry, identity login, and profile setup with photo upload. Manages state resets, phone validation, and saving user profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstallPrompt.t: Hook that captures the PWA install prompt event and exposes installability state and a trigger function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor calls for user profiles, phone checks, and password operations with error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark theme color variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ChatsPage.tsx: Chat interface managing conversation list, detail view, and new conversation dialog with responsive behavior.
frontend/src/pages/GroupsPage.tsx: Placeholder page showing a coming-soon card for group conversations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with branding, PWA callout, and sign‑in CTA.
frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Coming‑soon page for live audio and video broadcast features.
frontend/src/pages/PeoplePage.tsx: Users listing page with follow/unfollow actions, tabs, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/PreLoginIntroPage.tsx: Intro screen before login showing branding, PWA prompt, skip option, and sign‑in button.
frontend/src/pages/StatusPage.tsx: Coming‑soon page for status updates that disappear after 24 hours.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Videos page displaying sponsored video feed with an informational alert.
frontend/src/utils/aiRewrite.ts: Provides deterministic text rewriting with modes for shorter, friendly, and formal using regex-based heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/aiSmartReplies.ts: Generates deterministic smart-reply suggestions using keyword matching and canned templates.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytes.ts: Validates image files and reads them into Uint8Array buffers for profile picture handling.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Stores and retrieves a flag in localStorage to track whether onboarding has been seen.
frontend/src/utils/phoneNumbers.ts: Extracts, normalizes, and deduplicates phone numbers from text or contacts, with a helper to detect Contacts Picker support.
frontend/src/utils/readFileAsBytesAny.ts: Validates images/videos up to 50MB and reads them into Uint8Array buffers for message attachments.
frontend/src/utils/registerServiceWorker: Registers the service worker in production, logs status, and handles update notifications.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Parses URL and hash parameters with sessionStorage persistence utilities and safe removal helpers.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappShare.ts: Builds and opens WhatsApp Web share URLs with prefilled text.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, layout, animations, and plugin settings.
project_state.json: Defines current project version, goals, UI direction, and feature requests for Vibechat, plus architectural notes and known login/deployment issues. Serves as the central state/config record for ongoing development and planning.
